docs.text: Haven Notes Welcome to the Haven Notes — mini-wiki website. This site contains all important recipes for Haven and Hearth game.

docs.text: Cheese Routes Sheep Oscypki 5.2 [Agi] Sheep's Curd > Mine Abbaye > Cellar Zamorano > Home Brique > Surface Cow Musky Milben 4 [Str, Int] Cow's Curd > Home Tasty Emmentaler > Mine Jorbonzola 3.4 [Int, Psy] Cow's Curd > Cellar Cellar Cheddar > Home or Surface Brodgar Blue > Mine Sunlit Stilton 2.8 [Csm, Con] Cow's Curd > Mine Motzarella > Home or Cellar Harmesan > Surface Midnight Blue 2.5 [Str] Cow's Curd > Cellar Cellar Cheddar > Home or Surface Brodgar Blue > Mine Jorbonzola > Cellar Creamy Camembert 1.2 [Agi, Csm] Cow's Curd > Surface Goat Majorero 3.2 [Prc, Csm] Goat's Curd > Mine Chabichou > Surface Gevrik 2.6 [Prc, Str] Goat's Curd > Surface Bucheron > Mine Graviera > Home Robiola 2.5 [Prc, Con] Goat's Curd > Home Banon > Mine Formaela 2.4 [Wil] Goat's Curd > Mine Chabichou > Home Chabis > Cellar Garrotxa 1.7 [Dex] Goat's Curd > Surface Bucheron > Mine Graviera > Home Gevrik > Mine Runestones Surface Move: Brodgar Blue, Bucheron > Mine Here: Cow's or Goat's Curd, Brique, Cellar Cheddar, Harmesan, Chabichou Ready: Oscypki (5.2), Majorero (3.2), Sunlit Stilton (2.5), Creamy Camembert (1.2) Mine Move: Abbaye, Jorbonzola > Cellar; Motzarella > Home or Cellar; Graviera > Home Move: Chabichou > Surface (Prc 3.2) or Home (Wil 2.4) Here: Any Curd, Tasty Emmentaler, Brodgar Blue, Bucheron, Banon, Gevrik Ready: Musky Milben (4), Jorbonzola (3.4), Robiola (2.5), Garrotxa (1.7) Home Move: Brique, Harmesan > Surface; Chabis > Cellar Move: Tasty Emmentaler, Brodgar Blue, Banon, Gevrik > Mine Here: Cow's or Goat's Curd, Zamorano, Cellar Cheddar, Motzarella, Graviera, Chabichou Ready: Gevrik (2.6) Cellar Move: Zamorano > Home; Cellar Cheddar > Home or Surface; Harmesan > Surface Here: Cow's Curd, Abbaye, Motzarella, Jorbonzola, Chabis Ready: Midnight Blue (2.5), Formaela (2.4)

docs.text: Move: Abbaye, Jorbonzola > Cellar; Motzarella > Home or Cellar; Graviera > Home Move: Chabichou > Surface (Prc 3.2) or Home (Wil 2.4) Here: Any Curd, Tasty Emmentaler, Brodgar Blue, Bucheron, Banon, Gevrik Ready: Musky Milben (4), Jorbonzola (3.4), Robiola (2.5), Garrotxa (1.7)

docs.text: Combat Tests results on 10k stats and qualities Equip: dragon helm, vapntreyiu, plate mail, plate gauntlets, plate greaves, bat wing, ranger's boots, wooden roundshield (for 1h weapon). attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP quick barrage sword 80r 600 -1 low blow sword 50g 0 -1 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 punch sword 80g 545 0 left hook sword 75b 485 0 punch both sword 75y 325 0 sideswipe sword 65y 780 0 flex sword 80b 0 0 uppercut sword 80y 0 0 haymaker sword 65y 345 0 steal thunder sword 50b 0 0 sting sword 80b 50y 1055 2 storm sword 90y 1300 2 knock sword 90r 1835 1 kick sword 80y 965 1 chop sword 75g 860 1 ravens bite b12 65g 65y 2755 4 go 4 jugular sword 70g 50r 1520 2+2 takedown sword 90y 1960 3 rip apart sword 30x4 685 6 cleave sword 65r 360 4+2 Weapon difference Spear deal more dps but you can't use shield with it. B12 is just slow. attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP full circle spear 75g 30r 185 0 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 full circle b12 70g 30r 110 0
docs.title: Combat

docs.text: Equip: dragon helm, vapntreyiu, plate mail, plate gauntlets, plate greaves, bat wing, ranger's boots, wooden roundshield (for 1h weapon). attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP quick barrage sword 80r 600 -1 low blow sword 50g 0 -1 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 punch sword 80g 545 0 left hook sword 75b 485 0 punch both sword 75y 325 0 sideswipe sword 65y 780 0 flex sword 80b 0 0 uppercut sword 80y 0 0 haymaker sword 65y 345 0 steal thunder sword 50b 0 0 sting sword 80b 50y 1055 2 storm sword 90y 1300 2 knock sword 90r 1835 1 kick sword 80y 965 1 chop sword 75g 860 1 ravens bite b12 65g 65y 2755 4 go 4 jugular sword 70g 50r 1520 2+2 takedown sword 90y 1960 3 rip apart sword 30x4 685 6 cleave sword 65r 360 4+2
docs.title: Tests results on 10k stats and qualities

docs.text: Spear deal more dps but you can't use shield with it. B12 is just slow. attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP full circle spear 75g 30r 185 0 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 full circle b12 70g 30r 110 0
docs.title: Weapon difference

docs.text: Notes Buildings designs: Orange: Cork Oak + Iron Ochre + Copper Blue: Silver Fir + Kyanite + Wrought Iron Green: Mayflower + Zinscpar + Tin Default Barter Stand: Board of Maple + Block of Mulberry + Linen Cloth A leech deals damage over 3 bites, approximately equal to its quality. Mushroom support radius = 9 tiles. Public structures qualities Stick q250+ = 1g SHM Kiln 208 SHM 179 LMC Smelter 153 LMC FForge 201 LMC PWheel 233 SHM Anvil 242 SHM Oven 157 BBS Top 10 trees Mulberry (silk + berries + leafs) Laurel (leafs) Pine (3 logs + bough) King's Oak (4 logs) Apple (fruits + juice + oddities) Walnut (2 logs + nuts) Yew (ranger's bow) Oak (woodsman's axe) Olive (2 logs + olive) Tea (oddities)
docs.title: Notes
